channel.title: Make a area pvp? help with code

item.title: Make a area pvp? help with code
item.dc:creator: @runevault runevault
item.description:
@runevault wrote:

i have the code for the wild,

public boolean isInWilderness(int coordX, int coordY, int Type) { if (Type == 1) { if ((coordY >= 3520) && (coordY <= 3967) && (coordX <= 3392) && (coordX >= 2942)) { return true; } } else if (Type == 2) { if ((coordY >= 3512) && (coordY <= 3967) && (coordX <= 3392) && (coordX >= 2942)) { return true; } } return false; }

but i want the wild to be in the city of yanyill? so how do i do that?

Read full topic
item.source: Make a area pvp? help with code
